s_synopsis: Wear The Cap. Be The Max. Save The Planet. You've seen every episode. You know all his moves. The question is... are you ready to wear the magic cap??? Dust off your traveling shoes - it's time to play Mighty Max! SkullMaster has scattered pieces of the mighty doom weapon all over the planet. Go solo or double the action in 2-Player Split Screen mode, and embark on an earth-saving scavenger hunt through time.
